name: part_001
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ爆誕祭​】激烈モーレツ3D歌ライブパッションバースデー【ホロライブ】 [E2CJV9UqTRM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka prepares backstage for her birthday live performance.
Omaru Polka performs the song 'I'm Not a Menhera!' on stage.
Transition screen showing live chat and event logo.
A skit featuring Polka chasing a giant omaru mascot on stage.
Polka celebrates her birthday with the audience, singing 'Happy Birthday to Me'.

subtitles.original: んー！んー！んー！
subtitles.english: Ngh! Ngh! Ngh!

subtitles.original: そんなんじゃ！
subtitles.english: Not like that!

subtitles.original: 声聞こえねえぞー！
subtitles.english: I can't hear your voices!

subtitles.original: ああもう無理今も無理心臓止まってるし
subtitles.english: Ah, it's impossible, even now, my heart's stopped.

subtitles.original: わかんないしもう無理無理無理無理無理無理
subtitles.english: I don't know, it's just no, no, no, no, no, no!

subtitles.original: やってらんないわ！精神崩壊！
subtitles.english: I can't do this! Mental breakdown!

subtitles.original: メンヘラじゃないし！全然普通だし！毎日ハッピー！
subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera! I'm totally normal! Happy every day!

subtitles.original: たまにはなって逃げたって
subtitles.english: Even if you run away once in a while,

subtitles.original: 逃げ出すことだってパンクじゃん
subtitles.english: Running away is just bursting, right?

subtitles.original: 無理もしないで
subtitles.english: Don't push yourself too hard.

subtitles.original: 私メンヘラじゃないもん！
subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera!

subtitles.original: 涙なんか見せないもん！
subtitles.english: I won't show you any tears!

subtitles.original: 世知辛いからほらだらだらと緩く
subtitles.english: The world is tough, so look, lazily and loosely,

subtitles.original: 毎日を生きてるだけ
subtitles.english: I'm just living my daily life.

subtitles.original: 私メンヘラじゃないもん！
subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera!

subtitles.original: 依存なんてしないもん！
subtitles.english: I won't be dependent on anything!

subtitles.original: 有り余ってヘラる感情だって
subtitles.english: Even these overflowing, messy emotions,

subtitles.original: 映えりゃ映えりゃいいもん！いらない！
subtitles.english: If they look good on social media, it's fine! I don't need them!

subtitles.original: メンヘラじゃないもん！
subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera!

subtitles.original: 裏垢だって少ないもん！
subtitles.english: I don't even have many private accounts!

subtitles.original: 薬なんて大っ嫌い！
subtitles.english: I absolutely hate medicine!

subtitles.original: うるさい構いもう知らない！
subtitles.english: Shut up, don't bother me, I don't care anymore!

subtitles.original: 通知オフの数奇人だったり
subtitles.english: I might be an eccentric with notifications off,

subtitles.original: 砂糖菓子もいない悩みには
subtitles.english: For worries without even a single sweet...

subtitles.original: ストロングしか勝たん！
subtitles.english: Only Strong Zero wins!

subtitles.original: 誰にも愛されちゃいない自分が
subtitles.english: The me who isn't loved by anyone,

subtitles.original: 好きじゃないけれど
subtitles.english: I don't like her, but...

subtitles.original: 私メンヘラじゃないもん！
subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera!

subtitles.original: Thank you baby!
subtitles.english: Thank you baby!

subtitles.original: ひゃっほー！
subtitles.english: Yahoo!

subtitles.original: 回せ回せ！
subtitles.english: Spin it, spin it!

subtitles.original: じゃーん！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: み、右から来るぞ！気をつけろ！
subtitles.english: I-It's coming from the right! Watch out!

subtitles.original: お前、私より出てんじゃねえぞ！
subtitles.english: You, don't stand out more than me!

subtitles.original: おいおいおいおい。ほら、あっち行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Hey hey hey hey. Look, let's go over there!

subtitles.original: え？どこ行った？
subtitles.english: Eh? Where did it go?

subtitles.original: あれ？さっきまでおったのにな。
subtitles.english: Huh? It was right here just now.

subtitles.original: あれ、おらん。
subtitles.english: Wait, it's gone.

subtitles.original: おらんな。
subtitles.english: It's not here.

subtitles.original: どこ行ったん？
subtitles.english: Where did it go?

subtitles.original: どこだ！？
subtitles.english: Where is it!?

subtitles.original: いた！お前、この、この...
subtitles.english: There! You... why you...

subtitles.original: 待て！そいつがルパンだ！
subtitles.english: Wait! That guy's Lupin!

subtitles.original: おら！あー！
subtitles.english: Take that! Ah!

subtitles.original: 屈折50年、ようやくここまで
subtitles.english: After 50 long years, finally chasing him

subtitles.original: やつを追いかけてきたが...
subtitles.english: all the way here...

subtitles.original: 一体どこにいるのか、何もわからない。
subtitles.english: I have no idea where on earth he is.

subtitles.original: 一体あいつはどこにいるんだ？
subtitles.english: Just where could that guy be?

subtitles.original: おっ、なんだ？
subtitles.english: Oh, what's that?

subtitles.original: あ、気のせいか。
subtitles.english: Ah, must be my imagination.

subtitles.original: どこに行ったんだ？
subtitles.english: Where did he go?

subtitles.original: いや、いるじゃねえか！
subtitles.english: Wait, he's right there!

subtitles.original: どう考えてもどこだよ！おい、姿を現せ！
subtitles.english: No matter how you look at it... where!? Hey, show yourself!

subtitles.original: ほら、おいでー！おいで、おいで！
subtitles.english: Come on, come here! Come here, come here!

subtitles.original: そう、いい子、いい子。
subtitles.english: That's it, good boy, good boy.

subtitles.original: よしよし、おいでー。
subtitles.english: There, there, come here.

subtitles.original: なんでだ！？なんでなんだ！？
subtitles.english: Why!? Why is it like this!?

subtitles.original: くそー！えっ、待って、俺落ち...
subtitles.english: Damn it! Wait, I'm falling...

subtitles.original: 次こそは。
subtitles.english: Next time for sure.

subtitles.original: ハ、ハ、ハッピ...
subtitles.english: Ha-ha-happy...

subtitles.original: ハッピーバースデー、トゥー、ミー...
subtitles.english: Happy birthday to me...

subtitles.original: ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ポルカ...
subtitles.english: Happy birthday to Polka...

subtitles.original: これはBGMだったかもしれない！
subtitles.english: This might have been the BGM!

subtitles.original: というわけで、改めましてポルカおるよ！
subtitles.english: And so, once again, Polka is here!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ5期生の尾丸ポルカです！
subtitles.english: I'm Omaru Polka from Hololive's 5th generation!

subtitles.original: ついに、ついに、ついに今日誕生日を迎えました！
subtitles.english: Finally, finally, finally, I've reached my birthday today!

subtitles.original: ハッピーバースデーのコメントありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for the Happy Birthday comments!

subtitles.original: おお！書いてる、書いてる！サンキュー、ハッピーバースデー！うおー！
subtitles.english: Oh! They're writing them, they're writing! Thank you, Happy Birthday! Whoa!

subtitles.original: いや、緊張して空回ってんのはいつものこと。
subtitles.english: Well, me spinning my wheels because I'm nervous is business as usual.

subtitles.original: えー、ま、でも、なんやろな。
subtitles.english: Um, well, but, what can I say.

subtitles.original: 今日もここからお送りしてるんだが...
subtitles.english: I'm broadcasting from here today as well, but...

subtitles.original: 今みたいに、ちょっともう一回歌おうか。
subtitles.english: Let's sing a bit more, like just now.

subtitles.original: じゃ、みんなと一緒に、もう一回歌おう。歌う、いくよ！
subtitles.english: Let's sing together with everyone one more time. Let's sing, here we go!

subtitles.original: せーの！ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー！
subtitles.english: One, two! Happy birthday to you!

subtitles.original: ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー・ミー！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday to you, me!
